mutants.code:
def check_points_on_rectangle_edges(points):
    if not points:
        return ''
    (px, py) = zip(*points)
    x0 = min(px)
    x1 = max(px)
    y0 = min(py)
    y1 = max(py)
    result = all((x in (x0, x1) or y in (y0, y1) for (x, y) in points))
    return 'YES' if result else 'NO'

def check_points_on_rectangle_edges(points):
    if not points:
        return 'NO'
    (px, py) = zip(*points)
    x0 = min(px)
    x1 = max(px)
    y0 = min(py)
    y1 = max(py)
    result = all((x in (x0, x1) or y in (y0, y1) for (x, y) in points))
    return '' if result else 'NO'

def check_points_on_rectangle_edges(points):
    if not points:
        return 'NO'
    (px, py) = zip(*points)
    x0 = min(px)
    x1 = max(px)
    y0 = min(py)

    return 'YES' if result else 'NO'

mutants.code:
def check_points_on_rectangle_edges(points):
    if not points:
        return 'NO'
    (px, py) = zip(*points)
    x0 = min(px)
    x1 = max(px)
    y0 = min(py)
    y1 = max(py)
    result = all((x in (x0, x1) or y not in (y0, y1) for (x, y) in points))
    return 'YES' if result else 'NO'
